siteMetadata.description:
Davusi Pump and Tank (Pty) Ltd is a turnkey solutions provider
   in the petroleum industry offering various services ranging from full service station
   solutions to maintenance and refusbishment of pumps and tanks

frontmatter.subheader: Your clients expect excellence. Now you can too

portfolios.header: Out with the old in with the new

frontmatter.subheader: Our experienced and dedicated team will ensure customer satisfaction

teamMember.bio: David boasts with over 20 successful projects under his belt and more than 20 years of experience in the industry, possessing various technical certifications.

With over 10 years of experience in all things pump and tank, Vusi knows his stuff. He is a certified Nupi, KPS / Fibre Lite and UPP installer and has on-hands experience on more than 15 pump and tank installation.

12 years of business experience with an additional five years in the pump and tank industry has provided Izak with a broad set of skills. As a certified project manager, Izak has more than ten successful projects in his portfolio.

frontmatter.subheader: Ready to start your next project with us? Give us a call or send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
